name: Blank Slate Protocol 2018
description:
Graduation Video Game 
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Following the robot uprising that forced humans to lock themselves in their palace, play either as the Strategist in charge of their security by resetting robots every year, or the Rogue robot trying to save his kind by preventing the reset.

Platform : PC
Engine : Unity 
Number of players :2

Producer : Thibault PAVIE
Game Design : Arthur PERALTA, Viviane PLOUZEAU
Game Art : Julia BLARDAT, Paul LE QUERE, Emilien MORISSET, Yohan SCHMITZ
Game Design & Programming : Alexis ALZOUBAIDY, Matthias de TOFFOLI, Ambroise RABIER
Music & Sound Design : Gaétan BARBAULT, Maxime VATOPOULOS
